answerText: The Balcony [or Le Balcon][10] This French author and former prostitute wrote The Balcony. He wrote about Solange and Claire, two masochistic household workers who kill the Madame, in The Maids.
heading: ACF Regionals  |2012 | Wellesley + Hunter  | 16 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: Three photographers in this play are named Blood, Tears and Sperm. For 10 points each: [10] Name this play in which Irma runs a brothel during a revolution and casts people to be the Chief of Police, the Chief Justice, and the Bishop, among others, in order to restore order.
